content:
FontStyle Enum

Definition

Specifies style information applied to text.

In this Article

[System.Flags]
public enum FontStyle
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
FontStyle

Fields

Bold

Bold text.
Italic

Italic text.
Regular

Normal text.
Strikeout

Text with a line through the middle.
Underline

Underlined text.
